edited_stories.edited_story_text: On the day of my sister's wedding, we hired a woman to come over to do all of the bridesmaid's hair.  My sister wanted a country look so, rather than bouquets, we carried baskets of flowers. My sister could not stop looking at her engagement ring. My grandmother and great aunt were both able to attend.  As usual, my brothers acted silly during the reception.
